//#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
//using namespace std;
 
int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int n,x,r,c,i,sum;
	//cin>>n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	while(n>0)
	{
		//cin>>x>>r;
		scanf("%d%d",&x,&r);
		i=0;
		sum=0;
		while(x>0)
		{
			c=x%10;
			sum=sum+c*pow(r,i);
			x=x/10;
			i++;
			
		}
		printf("%c",sum);
		n--;
	}
	return 0;
}
